brief:
Limits the rendering to the boundaries of a rectangle defined
 by the parameters
name: clip()
description: Limits the rendering to the boundaries of a rectangle defined by the parameters. The boundaries are drawn based on the state of the imageMode() function, either CORNER, CORNERS, or CENTER.

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: x-coordinate of the rectangle, by default

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: y-coordinate of the rectangle, by default

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: width of the rectangle, by default

parameters.name: d
parameters.description: height of the rectangle, by default
